choice_enter_manual_or_fetch_cloud.description:
A LaMetric device can be set up in Home Assistant in two different ways.

You can enter all device information and API tokens yourself, or Home Asssistant can import them from your LaMetric.com account.

data_description.host: The IP address or hostname of your LaMetric TIME on your network.
data_description.api_key: You can find this API key in [devices page in your LaMetric developer account](https://developer.lametric.com/user/devices).

data.device: Select the LaMetric device to add

abort.link_local_address: Link local addresses are not supported
abort.missing_configuration: The LaMetric integration is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
abort.no_devices: The authorized user has no LaMetric devices
abort.reauth_device_not_found: The device you are trying to re-authenticate is not found in this LaMetric account
